channel.title: [PI] adding [$$$] before donator public chat
channel.description: how would it be possible to add just text that says [$$$] before a donators public chat? i was hoping for a turnout like "[$]Donator: THIS SERVER ROCKS!" or something like that but without using sprites, can anyone help me do this?
